article_title: Intuitive Surgical's Sales Improve On Growth In da Vinci Systems, Procedure Volumes

article_metadata.author: Great Speculations

og.description: Reflecting the rise in procedure volumes, sales of the company’s da Vinci systems improved about 6.5% over the previous quarter to about $170 million. Instruments and Accessories revenues grew 14% y-o-y to about $273 million, while Service revenues grew in high single-digits over the prior year quarter to over $108 million. On the cost side, the company’s gross margin in Q3 2014 was 65.6% compared to 67.2% in Q2 2014 and 71.5% in Q3 last year.
